title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, the absolute path is being stored.
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer is storing the absolute path instead of the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should store the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Choose to include a library in the report design.
4. Save the report design.
5. Check the path of the included library to see if it is stored as a relative path or an absolute path.
